title: Hello Kitty no Yume Dorobou (Hello Kitty in The Dream Thief)
synopsis: A mysterious black creature is stealing dreams and causing Mimmy and Kitty to be sleep deprived. It's up to Kitty to catch the thief.
staff: [['Hata, Masami', ['Director']], ['Hoshiyama, Hiroyuki', ['Script', ' Original Creator']], ['Nagashima, Youko', ['Art Director']], ['Isaka, Junko', ['Animation Director']]]
